creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: Crest (Watercolor) name of Fairfield. The shield contains three acorns and is surmounted by a closed, side-faced helmet in blue and gold, flanked toward the top by two red plumes, and toward bottom by two green eagles. The shield is formed by brown sheaves of leaves entwined with floral sprays, and on the scroll are the words Name of Fairfield.
medium: Watercolor and ink over graphite heightened with gouache and gilding on off-white wove paper
title: Crest: Name of Fairfield
